stories.title: What choices does the world need to make to keep global warming below 2 C?
Land Value Tax in Online Games and Virtual Worlds

stories.text:
I incorporated with clerky in September of 2021 but stopped working on the company until around a month ago. I now realized that I never filed my 83(b) election. I haven't vested yet, and haven't raised or made any money. Do I really have to hire a startup lawyer at $1000 / hr to mend this? Should I just dissolve the C Corp and make a new one?

Thanks!
stories.title: Ask HN: What should I do if I miss my 83(b)?

stories.text: I'm looking for studies or references looking at how/when vulnerabilities are more likely to be found in libraries. This relates to allow vs block listing of third party libraries.
stories.title: Question: Are vulnerabilities found more often in newer or older libraries?

stories.text: Hi HN. I've gotten pretty tired of needing to learn a custom programming language for a tool I use once a week or less. So I figured, it might be easier to pick up if `jq` used a programming language I already know. Voila, gq.
stories.title: Show HN: gq â€“ like jq or zq, but you use Go
